name: Alma: Chapter 1
description:
Story

Alma is currently in coma but his soul is now in the spirit world to return to his body he needs to enter in the Soul University and finish the challenges there but before he can go to the university he needs to collect all of his soul scattered around the Spirit real jungle. Help Alma return to his body.

Controls

Arrow keys: move left and right

Space bar: Jump

Jump + Shift: Dash

Q - Fire Orb

W- Shield Orb

E - Speed Orb

Z - Paused
